_comment: Configuration template for Paracord. Run 'python3 paracord.py --discover' to auto-generate this file.

_settings_reference.search_delay: Seconds between message searches (10 is proven safe, 30-40 is conservative)
_settings_reference.delete_delay: Seconds between deletions (1 is proven safe, 3 is conservative)
_settings_reference.skip_meowed: Skip messages containing 'Meow Meow Meow Meow' (preserve meowed messages)
_settings_reference.max_retries: Max retry attempts for failed deletions
_settings_reference.dry_run: Preview mode - shows what would be deleted without deleting
_settings_reference.meow_mode: off = normal delete, edit_and_delete = edit to 'Meow Meow Meow Meow' then delete, edit_only = edit to meows and leave standing
